amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $100,000 from being used for the Myrtle Beach International Trade and Conference Center of the City of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, and reduce the amount of section 511 of the bill by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 111-208 to prohibit $100,000 from being used for the Myrtle Beach International Trade and Conference Center of the City of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, and reduce the amount of section 511 of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 332 (Roll no. 567).
